Design Patterns in R 0.0.2

Unit Of Work Pattern

Source: R/object_relational-UnitOfWork.R
AbstractUnitOfWork.Rd

Maintains a list of objects affected by a business transaction and coordinates the writing out of changes and the resolution of concurrency problems. Fowler (2002) , p. 184.

References

Fowler M (2002). Patterns of enterprise application architecture. Addison-Wesley Longman Publishing Co., Inc. ISBN 0321127420.

See also

Other object-relational patterns: AbstractRepository

Super class

R6P::Singleton -> Repository
